cui_name: Severe combined immunodeficiency with low or normal B-cell numbers
reasoning: Specific SCID subtype with B-cell presence but T-cell deficiency. Global SCID incidence ~1 per 100,000 live births; this phenotype represents approximately 20-30% of SCID cases, estimated at ~0.2 per 100k births.
source: Immunodeficiency registries and newborn screening data
